show.title: Yaazhini Endroru Thenaruvi
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/yVGeaM
show.description: Yazhini, abandoned by a billionaire, grows up in an old-age home. On his deathbed, he wills his fortune to her, triggering a search and deceitful claims, while Yazhini refuses to leave her home.
show.description_secondary: Yazhini, abandoned by a billionaire, grows up in an old-age home. On his deathbed, he wills his fortune to her, triggering a search and deceitful claims, while Yazhini refuses to leave her home.
